compatibility.notes: The Multics license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Retain copyright and historical background in all copies and documentation.
Do not use the names of the organizations involved in advertising without permission.
license.name: Multics
obligations: Include the copyright notice in all copies.
Include the historical background in all copies.
Include the permission notice in supporting documentation.
Obtain specific prior written permission to use the names of MIT, HIS, BULL, or BULL HN in advertising or publicity.
